name: Anko Mitarashi
description: A kunoichi and former student of Orochimaru.

name: Asuma Sarutobi
description: A member of the Sarutobi clan and leader of Team 10.

name: Baki
description: A jonin from Sunagakure and mentor to the Sand Siblings.

name: Chiyo
description: A retired puppeteer and elder of Sunagakure.

name: Choji Akimichi
description: A member of Team 10 and the Akimichi clan.

name: Dan Kato
description: A medical ninja and Tsunade's lover.

name: Deidara
description: A rogue ninja and member of the Akatsuki known for his explosive art.

name: Dosu Kinuta
description: A genin from Otogakure who uses sound-based attacks.

name: Ebisu
description: A special jonin and Naruto's temporary tutor.

name: Gaara
description: The Fifth Kazekage and a jinchuriki of the One-Tail.

name: Genma Shiranui
description: A special jonin known for his laid-back demeanor.

name: Haku
description: A loyal follower of Zabuza with a tragic past.

name: Hayate Gekko
description: A special jonin and proctor of the Chunin Exams.

name: Hiashi Hyuga
description: The head of the Hyuga clan and father of Hinata.

name: Hidan
description: A member of the Akatsuki who practices a deadly ritualistic jutsu.

name: Hinata Hyuga
description: A member of Team 8 and heir to the Hyuga clan.

name: Hiruzen Sarutobi
description: The Third Hokage and a wise leader of the village.

name: Hizashi Hyuga
description: Hiashi's twin brother and a member of the Hyuga clan's branch family.

name: Ibiki Morino
description: The head of the Konoha Torture and Interrogation Force.

name: Ino Yamanaka
description: A member of Team 10 and the Yamanaka clan.

name: Iruka Umino
description: A kind-hearted academy instructor and Naruto's mentor.

name: Itachi Uchiha
description: A prodigy of the Uchiha clan and member of the Akatsuki.

name: Jiraiya
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and Naruto's mentor.

name: Jirobo
description: A member of the Sound Four with immense physical strength.

name: Kabuto Yakushi
description: A spy and right-hand man of Orochimaru.

name: Kakashi Hatake
description: The leader of Team 7 and a skilled jonin.

name: Kakuzu
description: A member of the Akatsuki who uses forbidden jutsu to extend his life.

name: Kankuro
description: A puppet master and brother of Gaara.

name: Kiba Inuzuka
description: A member of Team 8 who fights alongside his dog Akamaru.

name: Kidomaru
description: A member of the Sound Four who uses spider-like techniques.

name: Kimimaro
description: The last member of the Kaguya clan and Orochimaru's loyal servant.

name: Kisame Hoshigaki
description: A member of the Akatsuki known as the Monster of the Hidden Mist.

name: Kurenai Yuhi
description: A jonin and leader of Team 8.

name: Might Guy
description: A taijutsu master and leader of Team Guy.

name: Naruto Uzumaki
description: The protagonist of the series and jinchuriki of the Nine-Tails.

name: Neji Hyuga
description: A prodigy of the Hyuga clan and member of Team Guy.

name: Obito Uchiha
description: A former member of Team Minato and key figure in the Akatsuki.

name: Orochimaru
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and a rogue ninja.

name: Rin
description: A member of Team Minato and a medical ninja.

name: Rock Lee
description: A taijutsu specialist and member of Team Guy.

name: Sai
description: A member of Team 7 and a skilled artist ninja.

name: Sakon
description: A member of the Sound Four with a unique twin-fighting style.

name: Sakura Haruno
description: A member of Team 7 and a skilled medical ninja.

name: Sasori
description: A puppet master and member of the Akatsuki.

name: Sasuke Uchiha
description: A member of Team 7 and the last surviving Uchiha clan member.

name: Shikamaru Nara
description: A member of Team 10 and a tactical genius.

name: Shino Aburame
description: A member of Team 8 who uses insects in battle.

name: Shizune
description: Tsunade's assistant and a skilled medical ninja.

name: Tayuya
description: A member of the Sound Four who uses genjutsu through her flute.

name: Temari
description: A kunoichi from Sunagakure and sister of Gaara.

name: Tenten
description: A member of Team Guy and a weapons specialist.

name: Tsunade
description: One of the Legendary Sannin and the Fifth Hokage.

name: Ukon
description: A member of the Sound Four and Sakon's twin.

name: Yamato
description: A member of Team Kakashi and a user of Wood Release.

name: Yashamaru
description: Gaara's caretaker and uncle.

name: Zabuza Momochi
description: A rogue ninja known as the Demon of the Hidden Mist.

name: Zaku Abumi
description: A genin from Otogakure who uses air pressure attacks.

name: Madara Uchiha
description: A legendary shinobi and co-founder of Konohagakure, Madara Uchiha sought to dominate the world using the power of the Sharingan and the Ten-Tails. His ambition led him to become a central antagonist in the Fourth Great Ninja War.

name: Pain
description: Pain is the alias of Nagato, a former student of Jiraiya and the leader of the Akatsuki. Using the Rinnegan and the Six Paths of Pain technique, he aimed to create peace through overwhelming force and destruction.

name: Killer B
description: Killer B is the jinchūriki of the Eight-Tails and the adoptive brother of the Fourth Raikage. A skilled rapper and swordsman, he is known for his cheerful personality and formidable combat abilities.

name: Guren
description: Guren is an anime-original character known for her Crystal Release kekkei genkai. She served under Orochimaru and was involved in missions related to the Three-Tails.

name: Kaguya Otsutsuki
description: Kaguya Otsutsuki is the progenitor of all chakra and the final antagonist of Naruto Shippuden. She consumed the God Tree's fruit and became the first wielder of chakra, later turning into the Ten-Tails.

name: White Zetsu
description: White Zetsu is a member of the Akatsuki and one half of the entity known as Zetsu. He was created from the victims of the Infinite Tsukuyomi and possesses unique abilities like cloning and merging with terrain.

name: Allied Shinobi Forces
description: The Allied Shinobi Forces is a coalition of the five great ninja villages formed to combat the threat of Akatsuki and the reanimated army during the Fourth Great Ninja War.

name: Rinji
description: Rinji is an anime-original character who served under Orochimaru. He worked with Guren during the Three-Tails arc and had the ability to control animals using ultrasonic waves.

name: Tailed Beasts
description: The Tailed Beasts are nine giant chakra creatures created from the Ten-Tails. Each has its own unique abilities and personality. Originally feared, they later sought freedom and mutual understanding with humans.

name: Gozu
description: Gozu is an anime-only character and a bodyguard of Guren. He possesses a large, ox-like physique and is extremely loyal, eventually sacrificing himself to protect his comrades.

name: Three-Tails
description: The Three-Tails, also known as Isobu, is one of the Tailed Beasts. It resembles a turtle and was sealed within different hosts, including Yagura from Kirigakure. It played a key role in the Three-Tails filler arc.

name: Mecha-Naruto
description: Mecha-Naruto is a robotic version of Naruto Uzumaki created for comedic effect in the Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution game. It features an arsenal of mechanical weapons and exaggerated powers.

name: Danzo Shimura
description: Danzo Shimura was a high-ranking Konoha elder who led the secretive organization Root. Obsessed with protecting the village by any means, he implanted multiple Sharingan and wielded the power of Shisui Uchiha’s eye.

name: Reanimated Shinobi
description: Reanimated Shinobi refers to deceased ninja brought back to life through the Impure World Reincarnation technique during the Fourth Great Ninja War. They were used as weapons by Kabuto Yakushi.

name: Utakata
description: Utakata was the jinchūriki of the Six-Tails and a former Kirigakure ninja. Known for his calm demeanor and use of Soap Bubble Ninjutsu, he featured prominently in a filler arc before being captured by the Akatsuki.

name: Ten-Tails
description: The Ten-Tails is the original source of all the Tailed Beasts, a monstrous entity created by combining the body of the God Tree with Kaguya Otsutsuki’s will. It is immensely powerful and central to the Eye of the Moon Plan.

name: Jugo
description: Jugo is a member of Taka and a subject of Orochimaru’s experiments. He possesses the ability to absorb natural energy and enter a berserk state, which serves as the basis for the Cursed Seal.

name: Karin
description: Karin is a sensor-type kunoichi from the Uzumaki clan and a member of Taka. She has exceptional healing abilities and chakra sensing, and harbors strong feelings for Sasuke Uchiha.

name: Fourth Raikage
description: The Fourth Raikage, A, is the leader of Kumogakure and older brother of Killer B. Renowned for his brute strength and incredible speed, he played a key leadership role during the Fourth Great Ninja War.

name: Suigetsu
description: Suigetsu Hozuki is a former test subject of Orochimaru and a member of Taka. He hails from Kirigakure and can liquefy his body at will, making him highly versatile in combat. He also seeks to collect all the Seven Swords of the Mist.

name: Konan
description: Konan was a founding member of the Akatsuki and the only female member during its peak. A former student of Jiraiya, she used Paper Release techniques and remained loyal to Nagato’s ideals until her death.

name: Third Tsuchikage
description: Onoki was the Third Tsuchikage of Iwagakure, known for his stubbornness and mastery of Dust Release. Despite his age, he played a vital role in the Allied Shinobi Forces during the Fourth Great Ninja War.
